review: We had visited the hospital and it was health problem for my daughter. ****** *** **** ***** We are visiting this doctor since 1.5 years. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. My daughter had muscle and bone problem. Also she had knee pain. There was not much waiting time in the hospital, it was for 30 minutes. We had been for second opinion with doctor. She is good now. My daughter actually had Muscle weakness. Later Different Dr Raj kiran told to continue medicines .

*** ** *** ********** ********* *********** ******* He has vast hands on experience in dealing with all child ortho problems be it with deformity corrections or any other ortho problems. In my case my very own uncle who himself is a senior orthopaedic surgeon referred me to him for my child’s clubfoot problem and Dr Vidyasagar was very good in curing it. He is always reachable on phone and ensures he clears all our doubts. In addition he ensures the best of the treatment is given to the patient with most optimum cost. ******* ** ********* ******** ********** *** *** *********** ********* Thank you Doctor

I had met the doctor as I had leg injury. Treatment was ok. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Everything was good. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor.   Hospitality was good. I am good now.

I had health issue so went to hospital. Doctor was fine and he was aware of symptoms and he help me out. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I was able to recover based on treatment. It was for fever and cold. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. I am good now. Waiting time was for 20- 30 minutes in hospital. Hospitality was good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My daughter had club foot on her right foot. We took her to Dr.vidyasagar when she was 7 days old. He checked patiently and explained the issue very clearly. It was cured within 3 months only by plasters. He is doctor of calm mind. You can ask any questions, he will answer patiently and treat kids kindly. Only a message away to contact. He makes jimself always available to treat kids. Very happy with his treatment. May many kids get such doctors. Thank you very much doctor.

We had been to hospital and it was for  health issue for my son. ********* *** ***** It was for orthopedic consultation we visited. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  Waiting time was for 30-40 minutes. My son is doing good. We use to visit regularly. Hospitality was good.
